      Method that compares the retrieved BabelNet synsets to IATE, Termium and conceptNet.
      void getBNRelations(it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset synset)
      Retrieves all relations of a BabelNet synset, checks if the target of the relation is already stored If the target synset is not yet written to our final resulting DB, this method assigns a unique id to the target synset, writes it to the DB and stores the id to a temporary field for later processing called "missingBNTargetIDs" and the related generated id to "bnID2synsetID"

    • Method Detail

      • resourceAligner

        public void resourceAligner()
        Main method to run through BabelNet, IATE, Termium, and ConceptNet and create a merged version based on a multilingual comparison of their synset entries

      • getBabelNetOverlap

        public void getBabelNetOverlap(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset>> babelSynsets,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<TermEntry>> iateTB,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<TermEntry>> termiumTB,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<TermEntry>> conceptNetTB,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> iateEnglish,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> termiumEnglish,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> conceptNetEnglish)
        Method that compares the retrieved BabelNet synsets to IATE, Termium and conceptNet. If the BabelNet synset overlaps in more than three terms across languages with the Termium and IATE synsets, we check the relations of the BabelNet sysnet. If it has relations other than the ones we wish to omit (see list at top) this method merges the synsets (also ConceptNet if available) and writes the merged entry to our final DB
        Parameters:
        babelSynsets: - all retrieved BabelNet synset of this batch
        iateTB: - all IATE synsets of this batch
        termiumTB: - all Termium synsets of this batch
        conceptNetTB: - all conceptNet synsets of this batch
        iateEnglish: - all English words in IATE
        termiumEnglish: - all English words in Termium
        conceptNetEnglish: - all English words in conceptNet
        missingBNTargetIDs: - target synsets of relations that have not been written to the final DB
        allMatchingIDs: - variable to keep track of already included BabelNet synsets and avoid writing them twice to the DB (if synonyms are queried later)

      • getConceptNetOverlap

        public void getConceptNetOverlap(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> iateEnglish,
                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> termiumEnglish,
                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> conceptNetEnglish)
        Method to calculate overlap of all conceptNet synsets that were not merged with BabelNet synsets and check whether they overlap with IATE and Termium. Only if they overlap, they are written to the final DB.
        Parameters:
        iateEnglish: - list of English words in IATE
        termiumEnglish: - list of English words in Termium
        conceptNetEnglish: - list of English words in conceptNet

      • calculateMultilingualOverlap

        public java.util.HashMap<it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> calculateMultilingualOverlap(java.util.List<it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset> synsets,
                                                                                                                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<TermEntry>> terminology)
        Method that checks the multilingual overlap of several synsets and terminological entries from TermBases that have been previously matched based on their English words
        Parameters:
        synsets: - set of BabelNet synsets containing that specific English word
        terminology: - set of the terminological entries from either IATE or Termium containing that specific English word
        results: - result map that is returned containing the overlapping synset and entry IDs
        Returns:
        the results map with synsets across all resources that overlap in more than 3 words

      • calculateMultilingualOverlapConceptNet

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> calculateMultilingualOverlapConceptNet(java.util.Set<TermEntry> conceptNet,
                                                                                                                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<TermEntry>> terminology)
        Method that checks the multilingual overlap of several synsets and terminological entries from TermBases that have been previously matched based on their English words
        Parameters:
        synsets: - set of BabelNet synsets containing that specific English word
        terminology: - set of the terminological entries from either IATE or Termium containing that specific English word
        results: - result map that is returned containing the overlapping synset and entry IDs
        Returns:
        the results map with synsets across all resources that overlap in more than 3 words

      • combineEntries

        public void combineEntries(it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset synset,
                           java.util.Set<TermEntry> iateEntries,
                           java.util.Set<TermEntry> termiumEntries,
                           java.util.Set<TermEntry> conceptNetEntries)
        First writes all BabelNet data and metadata to the EVALution synset and then merges it with the synsets of the other resources
        Parameters:
        synset: - BabelNet synset to be merged with other entries because it overlaps in more than three words
        iateEntries: - IATE synsets that are to be merged
        termiumEntries: - termium synsets that are to be merged
        conceptNetEntries: - conceptNet entries that are to be merged

      • combineCNWithTerminologies

        public void combineCNWithTerminologies(java.util.Set<TermEntry> conceptNetEntries,
                                       java.util.Set<TermEntry> iateEntries,
                                       java.util.Set<TermEntry> termiumEntries)
        ConceptNet entries that are to be merged with IATE and Termium because it overlaps in more than three words across langauges
        Parameters:
        conceptNetEntries: - conceptNet synsets to be merged
        iateEntries: - IATE synsets to be merged
        termiumEntries: - Termium synsets to be merged

      • mergeEntries

        public void mergeEntries(java.util.Set<TermEntry> terminology,
                         java.lang.Long synsetID,
                         java.lang.String generatedID,
                         java.lang.Boolean conceptNet)
        Auxiliary method that merges the BabelNet synset that has been written to DB with the terminological synset
        Parameters:
        terminology: - synset of a terminological resource
        synsetID: - EVALution synset id assigned to the BabelNet synset
        generatedID: - EVALution generated UUID
        conceptNet: - Boolean that tells the method whether the synsets are from conceptNet or not

      • writeAllWordSenses

        public void writeAllWordSenses(java.lang.String term,
                               java.lang.String lang,
                               java.lang.String wordSense,
                               it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset synset,
                               java.lang.Long wordID,
                               java.lang.Long languageID,
                               java.lang.Long sourceID)
        Method that retrieves all BabelNet senses for a specific term and stores them for reference in our final DB
        Parameters:
        term: - term to query senses in BabelNet
        lang: - language of the term to enable query
        wordSense: - source wordSense of synset from which we obtained the term
        synset: - source synset from which we took the term
        wordID: - the id associated with the term in our final DB
        languageID: - the id associated with the language of the term in our final DB
        sourceID: - the id associated with the source (BabelSynset id) in our final DB

      • checkBNRelations

        public java.lang.Boolean checkBNRelations(it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset synset)
        Checks whether a BabelNet synset has any relations that are not in the list of relations we wish to omit Stops if one such relation is found and returns true
        Parameters:
        synset -
        Returns:
        true if relation is found, false if synset has no valid relation

      • checkCNRelations

        public java.lang.Boolean checkCNRelations(java.lang.String cnid)
        Checks whether a conceptNet id has any relations that are not in the list of relations we wish to omit Retrieves all associated and valid relations from the Database and returns true if relations are found
        Parameters:
        cnid -
        Returns:
        true if valid relation is found, false if no relation is found

      • getBNRelations

        public void getBNRelations(it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynset synset)
        Retrieves all relations of a BabelNet synset, checks if the target of the relation is already stored If the target synset is not yet written to our final resulting DB, this method assigns a unique id to the target synset, writes it to the DB and stores the id to a temporary field for later processing called "missingBNTargetIDs" and the related generated id to "bnID2synsetID"
        Parameters:
        synset: - source synset of relations
        omittedBNRelations: - relations that we do not wish to include in the final database (see list at the top)
        bnID2synsetID: - all BabelNet synset IDs and their mapping to a reference ID in our final DB
        missingBNTargetIDs: - all BabelNet synset ids that are target synsets of relations but not yet in the final DB

      • getCNRelations

        public void getCNRelations(java.lang.String cnid,
                           java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> conceptNetEnglish)
        Retrieves all relations of a conceptNet id and checks if the target synset has already been stored in our resulting Database. If not, the method assigns a unique id to the target synset, stores it in our DB and in a temporary field called "missingCNTargetIDs" for later processing as well as the created associated id in the field cnID2synsetIDs
        Parameters:
        omittedCNRelations: - relations that we do not wish to include in the final database (see list at the top)
        cnid: - the source cnid for which all relations are checked
        cnID2synsetID: - map to store all cnids and their related reference IDs in our final resource
        missingCNTargetIDs: - all conceptNet ids that are target synsets of relations but not yet in the final DB
